tree.name: describedir
tree.description: Root package for describedir, providing CLI entry point, configuration, file‑I/O utilities, LLM client and prompt logic, schema definitions, and recursive traversal to build a JSON description of directory contents.

children.name: __init__.py
children.description: Defines package metadata and version for describedir.

children.name: __main__.py
children.description: Executes the CLI entry point by calling cli.main.

children.name: cli.py
children.description: Parses arguments, builds directory tree, orchestrates LLM calls, and writes JSON output.

children.name: config.py
children.description: Holds ignore patterns, LLM defaults, file size limits, and output filename.

children.name: fileio.py
children.description: Detects binary files and reads text content with optional truncation.

children.name: llm.py
children.description: Creates OpenAI client, constructs prompts, batches file descriptions, and handles retries.

children.name: schema.py
children.description: Dataclass models for FileNode and DescriptionOutput with JSON serialization.

children.name: traversal.py
children.description: Recursively builds a FileNode tree and yields directories bottom‑up for processing.
